name: gameconnecting
description: A real-time game server connection platform

scripts.start: npm run set-prod && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: npm run set-dev && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-workspaces: npm install -w backend && npm install -w frontend
scripts.set-dev: cp backend/.env.development backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.development frontend/.env
scripts.set-prod: cp backend/.env.production backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.production frontend/.env

author: FlowerRealm <admin@flowerrealm.top>
